communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm stuck in this damn wheelchair, dealing with two kids and a world that doesn't care. Tomatoes? Can't stand them. My life's a mess, and society's to blame. Women get everything handed to them, while I struggle every day. It's not fair, and I'm tired of it.
narratives.p_intro: I'm incel_0031_dde4bd, the voice of the ignored. I lash out at a society that's rigged against me. Women, you think you're so special? Wake up. It's time someone told you the truth about your privilege and my pain.
